name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabs to Clipboard and vice versa

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy all open tabs of a window to Clipboard. Open all comma separated urls in clipboard with two clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the URLs of all open tabs in a window to the clipboard. Save the list or send it to a friend. Then open all links as new tabs in 2 clicks.
